author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Sam Hamilton "Extending the search when receiving a Purchase Order" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3777) - OFBIZ-3777
This patch is to add a couple of extra ways to look for a purchase order when receiving it into a facility

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Ankit Jain "Edit/Navigate Global GL Account - Found URL parameter [glAccountId] passed to secure (https) request-map with uri [updateGlAccount]" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3316) - OFBIZ-3316
The error can be reproduced as following:
1) Go to Accounting > Global GL Settings > Select any value(100000) from the list > in the "Edit GL Account" update the record > now in the "Navigate Accounts" section click on any node .
Then you will get the error .......
